page.title: 07SPENNITHORNE-A SCHOOLDAY
page.content: A TYPICAL SCHOOLDAY STARTS AT 7.45AM. I GET U.P FOR MY BREAKFAST I HAVE BACON FOR MY BREAKFAST AND MY MUM PUTS MY CLOTHES OUT FOR ME ON MY BED AND I HAVE GOT TO FEED OUR ANIMALS AND THEN I SET OFF TO SCHOOL AT 8.30AM AND I HAVE ABOUT 3 QUARTERS OF A MILE TO WALK.WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL WE PLAY.AT 9.00AM WE GO INTO SCHOOL.WE HAVE ASSEMBLY,THEN WE HAVE MATHS UNTIL PLAYTIME AND IN PLAYTIME WE PLAY MARBLES AND OTHER GAMES.THEN WE COME IN AND DO ENGLISH AND THEN AT 12.00PM WE HAVE DINNER.I HAVE A SCHOOL DINNER. WE HAVE VEGETABLES,POTATOES,FISH FINGERS OR MEAT.WE HAVE A SECOND COURSE AS WELL.THEN WE HAVE PLAYTIME AND WE TALK AND PLAY GAMES,SOMETIMES WE GO ON THE COMPUTER.THEN EACH CLASS WALKS IN AND IN THE AFTERNOON WE PLAY GAMES.
